item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

6/27/2011's location will be:
Kelly's

Kelly's is an Irish pub located near the corner of Crown and Temple under the Kelly House apartments. There is of course the Irish wood work at the bar, a nice fireplace decor in the dinning room, and if the weather does permit you could get a table on the patio. The menu features a mix of a few old Irish favorites and more common American fare.

Please RSVP for this event to give Kelly's an accurate heads up.

For Happy Hour Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

Specials:

The manager Patrick puts some free nibbles out in the bar area.

$1 off drafts

One T.B.D. Beer will be $2.

AJ will host and can be reached at 315-345-9348.

For more information about the Pub:
www.kellysnewhaven.com

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host and/or we're one of the largest groups at the Bar on a Monday.
item.name: Happy Hour - Kelly's (6/27)
